clue: Queer off-centre frame for art â€“ only 25 cents
explanation: "Queer off-centre" gives QUER. QUER as a frame for ART gives QU(ART)ER. QUARTER, only 25 cents.
hints: A couple of playful wordplay indicators here, one of which is "off-centre". What could off-centre mean, as a wordplay instruction?
One part of the wordplay is going to be a "frame" for another part. The second part will be surrounded (framed) by the first.
